{"step_by_step_thinking": "Pelvimetry (author's transl) describes a technique that uses Fernstroem's AP view. Autolok band and Double point test with the Goldmann perimeter are about retinal detachment and hemianopia testing respectively. A rapid method for reading migration inhibition tests is described, and Technical note discusses Trimax system's X-ray exposure reduction.
